<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row justify="center">
            <v-col cols="6">
                <v-card-title class="text-h5 text-center">
                    Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-form>
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Ïù¥Î©îÏùº"
                            type="email"
                            v-model="email"
                            prepend-icon="mdi-email"
                            
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="ÎπÑÎ∞ÄÎ≤àÌò∏"
                            type="password"
                            v-model="password"
                            prepend-icon="mdi-lock"
                        />
                        <v-row>
                            <v-col>
                                <!-- block : ÏÜçÌïú rowÏóêÏÑú ÎÑàÎπÑÎ•º ÍΩâÏ±ÑÏö∞Îäî ÏòµÏÖò -->
                                <v-btn color="primary" block @click="memberLogin()">
                                    Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏
                                </v-btn>
                            </v-col>
                        </v-row>
                    </v-form>
                </v-card-text>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    data(){
        return {
            email: "",
            password:"",
        }
    },
    methods:{
        async memberLogin(){
    try{
        const data = {
            email: this.email,
            password: this.password
        }
        const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/member/doLogin", data)
        
        // üî• Ïù¥ Ï§ÑÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï¥ÏÑú Ïã§Ï†ú ÏùëÎãµ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌôïÏù∏
        console.log('Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏùëÎãµ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞:', response.data);
        
        const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
        const refreshToken = response.data.refreshToken;
        
        // üî• ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Í∞í ÌôïÏù∏
        console.log('accessToken:', accessToken);
        console.log('refreshToken:', refreshToken);
        
        localStorage.setItem('accessToken', accessToken);
        localStorage.setItem('refreshToken', refreshToken);

        window.
                        
        this.$router.push('/')
    } catch(e) {
        console.log(e);
        alert(e.response.data.statusMessage)
    }
}
    }
}
</script>
